title: Flounder
content:
Flounders are items and related skill nodes used by the Fisher profession.

They are the first type of fish, caught on the East Beach, beginning as a Level 0 Fisher. They may be obtained with a Fishing Spear by Catching the Flounder skill nodes.

The are currently no known uses for the fish, other than for profit. The fish may be sold to the Fishmonger on Eel Street.


 * Olive Flounder (skill node)
 * Stone Flounder (skill node)
 * Arrowtooth Flounder (skill node)
 * Peacock Flounder (skill node)
 * Peacock Flounder (skill node)
